Instructions:
Download the file from this site: http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?d3dx9_42
and put it where the EXE file is (of the game)

Hi ! When I click on the mafia2.exe, the game start but my screen says "VIDEO MODE NOT SUPPORTED" ...
I think it's a problem of the resolution (normally 1280x1024).
Where is the INI file to change it?
What can I do ?

@rom1725 u can find it here:
C:\Users\\AppData\Local\2K Games\Mafia II\Saves
,where  is your windows user. There will be a file named "videoconfig.cfg". Just open it with notepad. It must look like this:

0 0 640 480 0 0 0 0

change 640 480 with ur resolution and save..

guys I've found a solution on a forum.... anyways when the game dose not start [you get 3 mother fuckers then it stops running] you should edit config file manually:

Go to saves folder: C:\Users\%username%\AppData\Local\2K Games\Mafia II\Saves in Win7,

 C:\Documents and Settings\%username%\Local Settings\Application Data\2K Games\Mafia II\Saves in Vista,

 not sure where it is in XP.

Edit videoconfig.cfg with text editor. Set 5th number to 0, save & run the game.


here is the link to the forum :
http://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=1415667

Please dont post things like " Help me, I don't have the folder %username% " 

%username% is actually your user name like Guest or dickhead or whatever username you got...
